item.how_to_find_us: Use the parking lot on New Street, or cross the park from Sherman St. to the other side. The entrance to the off leash area is at the end of the New Street parking lot. If you run into trouble, ask anyone where the "dog park" is. :)

group.name: The Boston Area Wheaten Terrier Meetup Group
